issue.title: PlasmaClient::Contains should return false before the corresponding object is sealed
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14273](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14273). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
According to the doc(<https://arrow.apache.org/docs/python/generated/pyarrow.plasma.PlasmaClient.html?highlight=contains#pyarrow.plasma.PlasmaClient.contains>), contains should return false before the corresponding object is sealed.
